verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H935>Go<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H853>Let<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>go,<s%> that they may <S%H5647>serve<s%> me.

And <S%H518>if<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H3986>refuse<s%> to let them <S%H7971>go,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> will <S%H5062>smite<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> thy <S%H1366>borders<s%> with frogs: <S%H6854><s%>

And the <S%H2975>river<s%> shall bring forth frogs <S%H8317>abundantly,<s%> <S%H6854><s%> which shall go <S%H5927>up<s%> and <S%H935>come<s%> into thine <S%H1004>house,<s%> and into thy <S%H2315>bedchamber,<s%> <S%H4904><s%> and <S%H5921>upon<s%> thy <S%H4296>bed,<s%> and into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of thy <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and upon thy <S%H5971>people,<s%> and into thine <S%H8574>ovens,<s%> and into thy kneading troughs: <S%H4863><s%>
And the <S%H6854>frogs<s%> shall come <S%H5927>up<s%> both on thee, and upon thy <S%H5971>people,<s%> and upon <S%H3605>all<s%> thy <S%H5650>servants.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>Say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> Stretch <S%H5186>forth<s%> <S%H853><s%> thine <S%H3027>hand<s%> with thy <S%H4294>rod<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H5104>streams,<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H2975>rivers,<s%> and <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H98>ponds,<s%> and <S%H853>cause<s%> <S%H6854>frogs<s%> to come <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

And <S%H175>Aaron<s%> stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> and the <S%H6854>frogs<s%> came <S%H5927>up,<s%> and <S%H3680>covered<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

And the <S%H2748>magicians<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> with their <S%H3909>enchantments,<s%> and brought <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H6854>frogs<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

Then <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> for <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6279>Entreat<s%> <S%H413><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> that he may take <S%H5493>away<s%> the <S%H6854>frogs<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> me, and from my <S%H4480>people;<s%> <S%H5971><s%> and I will <S%H853>let<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>go,<s%> that they may do <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> <S%H6286>Glory<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> me: <S%H4970>when<s%> shall I <S%H6279>entreat<s%> for thee, and for thy <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and for thy <S%H5971>people,<s%> to <S%H3772>destroy<s%> the <S%H6854>frogs<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> thee and thy <S%H4480>houses,<s%> <S%H1004><s%> that they may <S%H7604>remain<s%> in the <S%H2975>river<s%> <S%H7535>only?<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4279>Tomorrow.<s%> And he <S%H559>said,<s%> Be it according to thy <S%H1697>word:<s%> <S%H4616>that<s%> thou mayest <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> there is <S%H369>none<s%> like unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God.<s%>

And the <S%H6854>frogs<s%> shall <S%H5493>depart<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> thee and from thy <S%H4480>houses,<s%> <S%H1004><s%> and from thy <S%H4480>servants,<s%> <S%H5650><s%> and from thy <S%H4480>people;<s%> <S%H5971><s%> they shall <S%H7604>remain<s%> in the <S%H2975>river<s%> <S%H7535>only.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5973><s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh:<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6817>cried<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> because <S%H5921>of<s%> <S%H1697><s%> the <S%H6854>frogs<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he had <S%H7760>brought<s%> against <S%H6547>Pharaoh.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses;<s%> and the <S%H6854>frogs<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H1004>houses,<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H2691>villages,<s%> and out <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H7704>fields.<s%>
And they gathered them <S%H6651>together<s%> <S%H853><s%> upon <S%H2563>heaps:<s%> <S%H2563><s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H887>stank.<s%>

But when <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> there <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H7309>respite,<s%> he <S%H3513>hardened<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H3820>heart,<s%> and <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them; <S%H834>as<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H1696>said.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>Say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> Stretch <S%H5186>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H4294>rod,<s%> and <S%H5221>smite<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6083>dust<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> that it may <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H3654>lice<s%> throughout <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

And they <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3651>so;<s%> for <S%H175>Aaron<s%> stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> with his <S%H4294>rod,<s%> and <S%H5221>smote<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6083>dust<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and it <S%H1961>became<s%> <S%H3654>lice<s%> in <S%H120>man,<s%> and in <S%H929>beast;<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6083>dust<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H1961>became<s%> <S%H3654>lice<s%> throughout <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

And the <S%H2748>magicians<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> with their <S%H3909>enchantments<s%> to bring <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3654>lice,<s%> but they <S%H3201>could<s%> <S%H3808>not:<s%> so there <S%H1961>were<s%> <S%H3654>lice<s%> upon <S%H120>man,<s%> and upon <S%H929>beast.<s%>

Then the <S%H2748>magicians<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> <S%H1931>This<s%> is the <S%H676>finger<s%> of <S%H430>God:<s%> and <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> was <S%H2388>hardened,<s%> and he <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them; <S%H834>as<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H1696>said.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> Rise up <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and <S%H3320>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh;<s%> <S%H2009>lo,<s%> he cometh <S%H3318>forth<s%> to the <S%H4325>water;<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> Let my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>go,<s%> that they may <S%H5647>serve<s%> me.

Else, <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518>if<s%> thou wilt <S%H369>not<s%> <S%H853>let<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>go,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I will <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H6157>swarms<s%> of flies upon thee, and upon thy <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and upon thy <S%H5971>people,<s%> and into thy <S%H1004>houses:<s%> and the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> shall be <S%H4390>full<s%> <S%H853>of<s%> <S%H6157>swarms<s%> of flies, and <S%H1571>also<s%> the <S%H127>ground<s%> <S%H834>whereon<s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> are.

And I will <S%H6395>sever<s%> in <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1657>Goshen,<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5975>dwell,<s%> that <S%H1115>no<s%> <S%H6157>swarms<s%> of flies shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H8033>there;<s%> to the <S%H4616>end<s%> thou mayest <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

And I will <S%H7760>put<s%> a <S%H6304>division<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> and thy <S%H5971>people:<s%> <S%H4279>tomorrow<s%> shall <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H226>sign<s%> <S%H1961>be.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3651>so;<s%> and there <S%H935>came<s%> a <S%H3515>grievous<s%> <S%H6157>swarm<s%> of flies into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and into his <S%H5650>servants'<s%> <S%H1004>houses,<s%> and into <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt:<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> was <S%H7843>corrupted<s%> by reason <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H6157>swarm<s%> of flies.

And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H413>for<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and for <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1980>Go<s%> ye, <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> to your <S%H430>God<s%> in the <S%H776>land.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> It is <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3559>meet<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> to <S%H6213>do;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> we shall <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> the <S%H8441>abomination<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God:<s%> <S%H2005>lo,<s%> shall we <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H8441>abomination<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> before their <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and will they <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5619>stone<s%> us?

We will <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days'<s%> <S%H1870>journey<s%> into the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> and <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> he shall <S%H559>command<s%> <S%H413><s%> us.

And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> will let you <S%H7971>go,<s%> that ye may <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness;<s%> <S%H7535>only<s%> ye shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1980>go<s%> very far <S%H7368>away:<s%> <S%H7368><s%> <S%H6279>entreat<s%> <S%H1157>for<s%> me.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> go <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5973><s%> thee, and I will <S%H6279>entreat<s%> <S%H413><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> that the <S%H6157>swarms<s%> of flies may <S%H5493>depart<s%> from <S%H4480>Pharaoh,<s%> <S%H6547><s%> from his <S%H4480>servants,<s%> <S%H5650><s%> and from his <S%H4480>people,<s%> <S%H5971><s%> <S%H4279>tomorrow:<s%> <S%H7535>but<s%> let <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> deal <S%H2048>deceitfully<s%> any <S%H3254>more<s%> in <S%H1115>not<s%> <S%H853>letting<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>go<s%> to <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5973><s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and <S%H6279>entreated<s%> <S%H413><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses;<s%> and he <S%H5493>removed<s%> the <S%H6157>swarms<s%> of flies from <S%H4480>Pharaoh,<s%> <S%H6547><s%> from his <S%H4480>servants,<s%> <S%H5650><s%> and from his <S%H4480>people;<s%> <S%H5971><s%> there <S%H7604>remained<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H259>one.<s%>

And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H3513>hardened<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H3820>heart<s%> at <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H6471>time<s%> <S%H1571>also,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> would he <S%H853>let<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>go.<s%>
